channel.title: Leetcodes on Siwei's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Leetcodes on Siwei's Blog

item.title: 1 Two Sum
item.description: package main import ( "fmt" ) func twoSum(nums []int, target int) []int { d := make(map[int]int) for idx, num := range nums { if v, ok := d[num]; ok { return []int{v, idx} } d[target-num] = idx } return nil } func main() { arr := []int{2, 7, 11, 15} fmt.Println(twoSum(arr, 9)) }

item.description: lc2 Hello, I just set up my Hugo blog! :)
